description: Learn how to make a perfectly crispy skin salmon for your next BBQ or family dinner. The olives, caper and lemon sauce take this recipe to the next level.
keywords: Salmon With Crispy Olives And Lemon Sauce
name: Salmon With Crispy Olives And Lemon Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle salmon, skin-side up, with remaining oil. Rub salt into skin. Place salmon, skin-side down, in pan and cook for 4 minutes or until skin is crisp. Flip and cook for a further 2 minutes or until just cooked through. Add olive mixture to pan with vinegar and cook for a further 1 minute. Serve with lemon halves.

Flip and cook for a further 2 minutes or until just cooked through. Add olive mixture to pan with vinegar and cook for a further 1 minute. Serve with lemon halves.
